english: autumn; fall; harvest season; (poetic) melancholic mood

etymology.description: semantic: 禾 (‘grain’) + phonetic: 𤒅 (OC *sʰɯw); sometimes analyzed as ideogrammic 禾 + 火.
etymology.interpretation: 禾 anchors the meaning in agriculture and the harvest season, while 𤒅 contributed the sound. Many also associate the graph with burning fields (火) after harvest to curb locusts, echoing early depictions of an insect over fire.

examples.chinese: 我们在秋收时去乡下(我們在秋收時去鄉下)。
examples.pinyin: wǒmen zài qiūshōu shí qù xiāngxià.
examples.english: We go to the countryside during the autumn harvest.

examples.chinese: 秋风带来一点忧思(秋風帶來一點憂思)。
examples.english: The autumn wind brings a touch of melancholy.
